caption:
Want your wig or topper to look next-level natural? ✨ Meet our Part Perfect Scalp Tape — your secret weapon for a flawless, scalp-like part!⁠
⁠
Key Benefits:⁠
✔️ Hides knots + blends transitions⁠
✔️ Gentle on the base, comfy on your scalp⁠
✔️ Easy, no-mess application + removal⁠
⁠
Just press it in place, and you’re good to go for a seamlessly realistic finish. 🖤⁠
⁠
🗒️ Directions for Use:⁠
⁠
1. Ensure the inside of the wig is clean and dry.⁠
2. Cut the tape to the desired length, then peel off the backing.⁠
3. Apply the tape to the underside of the wig cap along the part.⁠
4. Press down gently to secure, ensuring the tape lies flat and blends with your scalp.⁠
5. To remove, simply hold base material and pull gently.⁠
6. Be sure to remove the tape before washing your wig to maintain its quality and longevity.⁠
⁠
